DataElement.preferredName: Study Site Investigator Contact Person Status Code FunctionalRoleStatus
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.:An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group._A condition or state at a particular time.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data._The code that describes a value specifying whether the state of participation of a role in the given study.

An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.
